Posts.Content: How is your arm doing, I have been thinking about you since last Sunday, it brings back many memories. Best Wishes, jmgemmill
Posts.Title: Insect Sting

Posts.Content: Call your doctor, he will probably give you a prescription for an antibiotic. A week after my surgery I had a similar thing happen, spiked a fever, and my arm swelled to several times its size. My doctor gives me a prescription to have on hand, it always seems to always happen on a weekend. My doctors cautioned me about insect bites, scratches and fingernail care - watch the cuticle. Don't wait until Monday, try to call your doctor now. Good Luck - jmgemmill
Posts.Title: Insect Sting

Posts.Content: Did you try to call your doctor???? JMGemmill
